sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Button from "./button"; import Form from "./Form.js"; import { useState } from "react"; import Table from "./Table.js"; import employeeJson from "./employee_tmp_list.json"; export const UpdateForm = () => { const [employees, setEmployees] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // Load the initial JSON data when the component mounts setEmployees(employeeJson); }, []); // Function to append an employee const appendEmployee = (newEmployee) => { // Create a new array by combining the existing employees with the new one const updatedEmployees = [...employees, newEmployee]; // Update the state setEmployees(updatedEmployees); // Save the updated data to local storage (for this simplified example) localStorage.setItem("employeeData", JSON.stringify(updatedEmployees)); }; return (
); };
